name: Spacrise
description:
A different approach to casual space-shooters, this is a boss rush type game with special emphasis upon unpredictability, you will find that things are not just trial and error, rather, are allways unpredictable, albeit reasonably(hopefully, this is why Im uploading this).

the images in the thumbnail are some of the ships that you will encounter, for this release, the ship and bullet sprites and backgrounds are not all included, except for one boss, this upload is mainly to get feedback for the control feel, game-play and sound effects, the sound effects have been added with doubt, but the game-play is refined, your feedback for these three things that was mentioned is crucial and  very appreciated, there are two difficulties for each stage, please express exactly how you feel with difficulty, controls, as well as fairness, and also the sound effects, enjoy!

Note: 

1- this has to be played on 60 fps, otherwise the gameplay is distorted considerably.

2- The web version doesnt show some graphics, the downloadable versions are the coherent and correct experience.
